text: [env] app env probe: {firebaseConfigIsValid: false, hasProjectId: false}

Firebase config error â€” missing env: VITE_FIREBASE_API_KEY, VITE_FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID, VITE_FIREBASE_APP_ID. Create a `.env.local` at the repo root with the missing values, for example:

VITE_FIREBASE_API_KEY=your_api_key
VITE_FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID=your_project_id
VITE_FIREBASE_APP_ID=your_app_id

then restart the dev server (npm run dev).
